data.text: @EricTopol @AnnalsofIM Curious about interactions between Paxlovid and phosphodiesterases...any ongoing or published research?

@EricTopol @Bob_Wachter @AnnalsofIM Here's an idea...  The drug-drug interactions w/ Paxlovid are a significant problem (w/ antiarrhythmics, anticoagulants, anticonvulsants, etc.) because of the ritronavir, so why not do clin trials with nimatrelvir alone given TID or QID w/out the ritronavir?
@EricTopol @AnnalsofIM Is paxlovid for long COVID as well?

@CupcakeMrs1 @EricTopol @AnnalsofIM My husband takes Eliquis. He has a hx of CVA and has high blood pressure. We’re both high risk, but aren’t eligible for Paxlovid or Evusheld. We’re not alone. #MaskInEssentialServicesPlaces

@EricTopol @Bob_Wachter @AnnalsofIM How do I switch from 6mg of oral budesonide that I’ve been on for 10+ years for microscopic colitis? My doctor denies it’s a systemic steroid. I accept the risks of taking that medication, but no alternatives. I also don’t qualify for Evusheld because I don’t fit their criteria.
@EricTopol @Bob_Wachter @AnnalsofIM Fuck you Topol! Hope you get indicted! piece of shit!
@EricTopol @AnnalsofIM So like my Grandmother discontinue her Xarelto and take aspirin? Seriously she has arrhythmia… and it getting confusing just to stay alive from covid.

@CupcakeMrs1 @EricTopol @AnnalsofIM They are not absolute contraindications, but probable interaction. Depending on your risk of serious illness, it may be necessary regarding the interaction; the best thing to do is to share the decision with your doctor.
